Super zentrale Lage, besser geht nicht. Man muss sich aber bewusst sein, dass es daf√ºr auch lauter ist.
Check in und out war sehr einfach. Wir haben die 10‚Ç¨ Option mit pers√∂nlichem Check in dazugebucht. Pedro war wirklich sehr freundlich und nett beim Check in, jedoch l√§sst die Sauberkeit des AirBnbs zu w√ºnschen √ºbrig. Auf der neuen Bettw√§sche waren √ºberall Haare, in der Bettdecke auch. Der Boden war komplett dreckig, jeden Tag waren die Socken schwarz. Das Waschbecken ist undicht, sodass das Wasser in den Schrank tropft und von dort aus auf den Boden.

Die Wohnung ist nicht f√ºr 3 Personen geeignet. Es gab nur eine einlagige Toilettenpapierrolle. 1 kleines Handtuch f√ºr H√§nde. Das Schlafsofa kippelt und quietscht bei jeder Bewegung, ist eher nur zum sitzen als schlafen geeignet.
Es gab f√ºr 3 Personen nur 1x Bettw√§sche daf√ºr 3 Bettlaken, und 3 Decken, aber n√ºtzt einem nichts ohne Bettw√§sche. Beim Anruf in der Zentrale wurde einem nicht geholfen, man soll alles extra zahlen und es sei alles ausreichend da und 2 Personen m√ºssten sich die Bettw√§sche teilen und die Person auf dem Schlafsofa sollte die Bettlaken in Bettw√§sche umfunktionieren. Was wir jedoch nicht wollten, weil dies unhygienisch ist und fremde Haare auf der Decke waren.
Erst nach mehrmaligen Schreiben √ºber Airbnb haben wir 1x Bettw√§sche und Klopapier am 2. Abend zus√§tzlich erhalten.

Als Paar ist das AirBnb mit einigen Abstrichen in der Sauberkeit f√ºr einen St√§dtetrip zu empfehlen, da die Lage wirklich perfekt ist.
F√ºr 2 Freunde auch, wenn man kein Problem mit Bettw√§sche teilen hat.
Zu Dritt auf keinen Fall wieder.

comments: Fatima was an exceptional host from start to finish. She offered great suggestions on where to eat and what to see and also gave me a fantastic recommendation for a Douro valley tour. If you plan to spend a lot if time inside the apartment, know that the walls are thin and you can hear people coming and going in the stairwell that connects all units. The location on the best pedestrian street in town, and accessibility to restaurants, some major sights and the train station  make it perfect for a short stay.

comments:

- Bedrooms were spacious (3 queen beds in separate rooms), comfortable, and well air conditioned!
- The location was great and walking distance to everything we wanted to do

- While we got there earlier than our check in time and the room was not yet available, Paula, allowed us to come in and drop our bags off as we explored the city. We were planning to come check in at 3PM, but changed our mind and checked in later at 5:30PM and Paula was very accommodating to this flexibility
- Paula was extremely responsive

name:
Charming Cl√©rigos Studio
*****Clean&Safe
comments:
Marilia's apartment was fantastic! So well located (and was so great for me because it was literally a 5min walk to the start of my Sandeman walking tour by Clerigos tower) and within walking distance to all the big attractions. However, because it's in a popular neighborhood and the flat faces the street, it was really hard for me to sleep at night because of the noise (and I was there at the start of the week).

It was also a little warm in the apartment with no AC but it wasn't a huge detractor.

It was also very clean, cozy, and perfect for one person.

Marilia was also such a fantastic host. My flight got in three hours before check-in and she was so accommodating and let me come by early. The cleaning lady was finishing up so I went for a quick stroll until the apartment was ready shortly after. Marilia was also so responsive throughout my stay.

name: Explore Nightlife Near a Cute Studio in a Historic Area
comments: The small apartment is perfectly arranged and has eeeverything you might need - it has all been taken care of and just ‚Äúmakes sense‚Äù. The location is fantastic and Claudia was a fantastic host who made sure we got all the support we needed. I have told my friends that they should definitely stay here, if they ever visited Porto, 10/10 would recommend.

name: Fantastic suite w/ bathroom. Porto city center
comments:
Mi sento di consigliare questa casa e questi host a tutti voi, ai miei amici e famigliari. Io e il mio ragazzo abbiamo viaggiato molto e visto molti airBNB ma solo qui ci siamo sentiti davvero come a casa. Zona bella e tranquilla a 15 minuti a piedi dal centro di Porto (o massimo 6 euro di taxi notturno). Facile e gratuito il parcheggio in zona. La casa e' stata da poco ristrutturata, qualche lavoretto e' ancora in corso e ha diverse stanze in affitto ma non ci sono rumori molesti perch√® tutto e' nuovo e ben insonorizzato. C'√® una simpatica gattina che ogni tanto fa capolino in casa ma non disturba e non si fa sentire. Le stanze sono nuovissime, con un design semplice, minimale e accogliente. La nostra stanza era sui toni del bianco e grigio con qualche piccolo tocco di rosso e simpatici cactus che animavano l'ambiente. Pulizia impeccabile ed ogni confort che ti fa sentire a casa: asciugamani morbidi, maxi doccia con vetro trasparente stupenda (non usciresti mai dal l√¨), letto comodo, simpatico terrazzino coperto con tavolino e sedie per guardare il cielo e bere una birretta o leggere un libro. Non si pu√≤ mangiare in stanza ma negli spazi comuni che sono enormi e la cucina, nuova, √® dotata di ogni confort. Internet e wifi alla massima velocit√†.
C'√® da sottolineare una cosa: questo spazio √® stupendo soprattutto grazie agli host! Elena e Francesco sono due persone eccezionali: simpatici, disponibili, sempre pronti a fornire informazioni e attenti a tutto. Non vedo l'ora di tornare, consigliatissimo!
In English: this is a home, not an house! The host are friendly and helpful people. You wille have a wonderful experience!

name: Golden Studio by Golden Homes an Urban Pad Retreat
comments: It‚Äôs hard to know where to begin when describing this beautiful apartment. The home itself had no flaws: excellent wifi, spotlessly clean,  tastefully decorated, an abundance of towels and toiletries, a functional kitchen, and a welcome air conditioner. The location is fantastic, away from the noise and people but a 10 minute walk to an area full of awesome bars and restaurants and not far from just about everything else. What really sets this place apart though, is the hosts. They were incredibly responsive, genuinely empathetic to our needs, and their passion for hosting really shone through in everything they did. I recommend this place without reserve, and will definitely stay here when I am in Porto next.

comments: This cute apartment is located in a perfect spot and is super convenient for a nice stay in Porto.  Unfortunately, there was a musty smell that we immediately noticed when we entered the apartment and it only got worse on the hotter days.  I let the host know and they responded immediately by bringing over some air freshener, which definitely helped.  Perhaps if the apartment stayed cooler on hotter days or had AC this smell wouldn't be as noticeable but it is a bummer since it's such a cute, well cared for apartment.

name: Myloft( new)| baixa HardRockCafe | Heart Down town
comments: Apartment is in great location to see the city sights.  It is right in the middle of everything and you can easily walk to many sights and tons of restaurants.  The apartment is very stylishly appointed. The only negative of the apartment  is that it is rather small even for a couple mostly because there is no storage space at all.  Therefore, any luggage you have you will have to walk around or over it.  Other issue of historic Porto you should plan for is parking if you have a car.  Most parking garages in the heart of the city are run by Sobo and not only are they very expensive at about $30 euro/day but worse than that is that they only accept cash and nothing over a $20 euro note.  There are cheaper garages around but you need to find them and plan before you go or if not just get ready for this frustrating and abusive parking issue.

Da alles auf einer Ebene liegt und es etwas Rasen gibt, toll f√ºr Babys. Renato kommuniziert schnell und unkomplkziert und gibt sehr gerne Tipps.

name: River Place
comments:
Susan ist a really friendly host. We had a very great stay there. The location is very central and the flat was very clean. We missed nothing there but you have to like dogs because of the neighbours. But they are friendly to you if you are too.
All in all we had a great time and would recommend this flat.

name: Loureiro Villas - C
comments: Proper place

name: B & B  Room Yoga Garden's Place
comments: Aurora and Alberto have a very curious and cosy home with a beautiful garden close to the city center. We felt very welcome and the couple had lots of tips and suggestions what and how to explore in Porto. We had a great stay and Alberto was so nice to let us join one of his yoga classes. I can only recommend the two hosts and their home!

name: BOUTIQUE Rentals-Toledo's One &Only Apt in RIBEIRA
comments: Spacy, clean and charming appartment. The kitchen is well equipped for some revitalising pasta before siesta. The only little draw back, if you are sensitive to noise, is the appartment's location on a  busy road.  The windows are quite good though, so if anyone wants to be in the heart of it, this is the right choice near the river Douro.

name: Kitchnette Studio in Porto's Downtown
comments: C'est parfait, excellent accueil, situation id√©ale au centre de Porto

name: APOSENTUS - CS TRINDADE APARTMENTS 1
comments: Excelente lugar ! Cumple expectativas, buena ubicacion.

name: GuestReady - Bonjardim 672 - Perfect Downtown Apar
comments: We loved it. It was close to restaurants and night life, great location, super safe and nice. The only issue were the next door neighbors, if you were in the living room you could hear them talking as if they were inside, otherwise it was a really nice place and the host really nice people.

name: House or Rooms Near the City Center
comments:
As there were 6 of us on holiday together we thought we needed a bit of space to ourselves, but also wanted to be able to all hang out together at times, Fatima's apartment turned out to be perfect for our 3 day stay in Porto.

4 of us were attending the NOS Primavera Sound music festival, while the other 2 wanted to check out the nightlife in Porto.

While it's about 10 minutes walk to Lapa metro stop from the apartment, once there you can be in Porto central in 3 quick stops, alternatively taking a (cheap) cab/Uber directly from the apartment will get you to the Ribeira area in less than 10 minutes.

The apartment is clean and spacious containing, a large living room/dining room, a large kitchen and 4 bedrooms, two containing a large double bed, one with two singles and another with 3 singles (we could really spread out). There were also two bathrooms which helped tremendously in the mornings when we were all preparing to go out.

The kitchen was stocked with tea and coffee (a capsule machine which helped not being too reliant on coffee shops), some other consumables (bread, eggs & milk) as well as a bottle of port for us to all share (thanks Fatima!).

All in all, we had a great holiday in Porto, attending the music festival, port tasting, visiting the beach, wandering around the river, checking out the food market and eating at the amazing Casa De Cha Da Boa Nova.

Fatima's apartment helped us feel more at home in Porto, and helped make the holiday a very enjoyable one!

name: ChillHouse_Porto - Pra√ßa da Rep√∫blica 2.2
comments: Very comfortable and cozy !! Great place

name: Casas de Sant'Ana Oporto Apt 2
comments: Our stay in Porto was made exceptional with the guidance of our host Cl√°udia. We arrived from the airport by taxi and walked up to the apartment. We were prepared for the amount of walking and stairs in Porto and thankfully did not bring a lot of luggage since it is accessible only by foot. We met Cl√°udia right after 3pm and she was there waiting for us to guide us around the apartment. After our tour, she offered us a map a Porto that she customized with recommendations tailored to our personal interests as well as help us find anything on the map we had wanted to visit. The apartment had everything you could need and more - from towels to extra blankets to nespresso pods, a sewing kit and miceller water. The location is ideal for a short and long visit- you‚Äôre no more than a 15-20 minute walk from everywhere. Communication was easy and Cl√°udia was quick to accommodate our late flight departure. We only wish we had more time to spend in Porto!

name: Vit√≥ria 392 - Central Loft
comments: Great flat well decorated and great location in the center of the old Porto.  Marco and Carlo were both really nice and communicating with us to check if we needed anything.

name: Downtown Apartment
comments: We had a great stay.

name: Oporto Waves - 2
comments:
Only issue and that have a major impact is that the bathroom have a very bad smell of sewer so make the overall experience negative.
Otherwise, Matosinhos is a fantastic location with a unique urban beach and perfect place to enjoy Porto. I would advice to correct the smell of sewers in the bathroom and then the place would be a competitive place to stay.

name: Spacious and Bright @ City Centre
comments: Lovely spacious and very clean apartment. Even better than the pictures.  Location is ideal. Hosts were great, very organised and extremely helpful, especially since they are based in the bakery below. Definitely recommend

name: ABEL'S @ MARQU√äS - 1 OF 4
comments: Great place to stay. Good natural light

name: My House Porto Gaia
comments: Recomendo 100%

name: NEW! Modern Invicta by Upperground
comments:
Great appartment, modern, clean, pretty, comfortable.
Good location, 5 min walk from Trinidade metro station which goes directly to the airport. 25 min walk to waterfront.
Easy check in, good service.
Windows are good isolated so it's quiet, you don't hear the noise in the street unless they're open.
Air conditioning.

name: Faisama Apartments ‚Ä¢ Duplex with 2 bedrooms
comments: Piso muy bonito,algo mal ubicado con respecto a donde aparcar para poder sacar el equipaje. Para alguien con movilidad reducida no lo recomiendo,porque tiene muchas escaleras para acceder a la parte superior del duplex. Por lo dem√°s genial.

name: Sweet City Shelter - Family Apartment

name: Back-to-Back House II
comments: Wonderful! Thank you so much!

name: Tito Studio Terrace with A/C
comments: This appartment was perfect for a couple. The mattress is confortable, everything is clean and handy. The location in rua do Bonjardim is closed to shops, restaurants and everything can be visited by foot. Communication with Edu was efficient, thanks again for hosting us!

name: Double room with private WC and balcony S√£o Bento
comments:
My wife and I stayed at Vitor's for a few nights and we did like the place. Everything was at our service, we could get inside at any time of the night. Well, we saw photos of facilities behind curtains - no big problem at this price, especially for solo travelers.
Also we weren't bothered much by noises despite the neighborhood of a railway station.
Besides, Vitor is a very nice person, friendly and kind.
All in all, Porto is a great town.
Thank you, Vitor!

name: Porto Viewpoint Apartment (free parking)
comments: Ery convenient location and the flat was very clean and comfortable.  15 minutes walk to the cathedral.  Maria is very kind and helpful host.  I really had very comfortable stay at her flat..  Thanks Maria

name: Baixa24 - Downtown Bliss 2 Twin Bed Sunny Room

name: Adorable Apartment In Great Area by PortoCityHosts
comments: Daniela explained us many useful things and her appartment is perfect, well located and very nice!

name: Liiiving in Porto | Garden Pool House
comments:
Afonso made us feel so welcome in this extremely comfortable pool house. Staying here was so relaxing, the pool is divine and the local area has lovely restaurants and shopping, as well as a beautiful coastline with plenty of spots to enjoy the chilled atmosphere.

The kitchen was VERY well equipped, we loved eating breakfast by the pool and I hope we get the chance to do it all again sometime!

name: Douro Bridges - Douro Riverside
comments:
We were in Porto for two nights for the last leg of our holiday in Portugal.
We could not have asked for a better location. We parked the car on arrival and left it there for the 2 nights.
Celeste and Jorge were very accommodating, we arrived early in the day before our room was ready but we able to leave our luggage at family business downstairs and park the car. This allowed us to start our touring !
The apartment is a small space but has everything that we needed , especially a beautiful view.
For guests with physical challenges, the steps upto the apartment could be challenging, especially with all the luggage.
If we go back to Porto , we will check it out again !

name: Cosy studio near Cl√©rigos tower
comments: Wonderful location, clean space, and an amazing host!

name: PORTO HQ LowCost 1 (sea views)
comments: Recomendo!!

name: GuestReady - Gimle Balcony
comments: My brother, friend, and I stayed here for a couple of nights. The place is even more spacious than it looks in the photos. Our host greeted us at night after we arrived 8 hours later than expected due to flight delays. The apartment is a 15 minute walk to  the main downtown area. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay. Thanks!

name: Oporto Apartment Triplex

Nous √©tions situ√©s √† 10 min √† pied du centre-ville, ce qui √©tait vraiment parfait.
L'appartement est exactement comme dans la description et sur les photos. Agr√©able, spacieux et avec une petite terrasse. En bref, nous avons pass√© un excellent s√©jour et recommandons vivement ce logement !

name: My Own Private Studio
comments:
Simply perfect! Two elements need to described - the place and the host. The place is perfectly located. Honestly , you cant find a better location. The design of the place is unique and amazing.

Luis is a symbol of a perfect host. Helpful to an extend that is hard to find in the world. And I dont mean airbnb world but WORLD WORLD:)

Definetly recommended!

name: ‚Äã For 4 or 5 - Wonderful Apartment downtown
comments: The appartement is perfectly localized in the center of Porto and fulfill perfectly our expectations. Clean, well lit and spacious, nothing else to say, it was just perfect.

name: YOUROPO - Cl√©rigos 1
comments: I was extremely pleased with this apartment. It was quite spacious and located in the middle of town, close to public transport, restaurants, shops, and the sights. It is on a busy street so there was some noise at night, but worth it to me to be so close to everything. Claudia was not available to meet me, but she gave good instructions on how to get in and answered my questions about the apartment promptly. I greatly enjoyed my two nights in Porto.

name: Sweet City Shelter - Family Apartment
comments: Enjoyed the stay at Clara‚Äôs place very much. The apartment has everything you need for a cosy holiday.

name: Quarto em casa com piscina em frente ao mar
comments: Great place to stay, really close to train station literally 2mins and close by to beaches!

name: Vitoria Viewpoint 1BR Flat by LovelyStay
comments:
We really enjoyed our stay at this beautiful apartment! The location was perfect, the kitchen well equipped and it was really clean. Unfortunately, the apartment was a but humid and, as many had already written, it is smaller than it looks in the photos.
But all in all we were very satisfied!

name: Ribeira Oporto Apartment (renovated 2022)
comments: La ubicaci√≥n del apartamento est√° genial, y estaba todo muy limpio y recogido cuando llegamos. La cama y el sof√° son muy c√≥modos y Jo√£o siempre respondi√≥ r√°pido cuando le escribimos. Estuvimos muy a gusto all√≠. Totalmente recomendable!!

name: 2 bedroom apartment with a view to Serra do Pilar
comments:
This is a lovely place to stay and convenient to explore Porto.
The view from the apartment is stunning.
The hosts were very good and helpful and met us on arrival and obtained a taxi for us on departure all of which we appreciated very much.
I would certainly stay again at this apartment and recommend it and the hosts highly to any guest.
[About a 10 minute walk away go to "La Ricotta" on R.Passos Manuel if you want an unforgettable meal].

name: GuestReady - Sun Spectrum
comments:
La casa est√° limpia y bonita y la ubicaci√≥n muy bien, pero tiene un problema de ruido, cuando el vecino de arriba anda cruje la madera y se oye mucho, es bastante molesto, sobre todo de noche o madrugada.

Miriam

name: MyLoft |condo Pool|1 line river Douro |
comments: He was late despite agreeing a time

name: Sunny Penthouse Porto Center
comments: The apartment is located perfectly. Everything on walking distance. Check in and check out was really smooth/easy and the apartment is nice with lots of space. I would come back here.

name: Ribeira - Dixo's Oporto Apartments IV
comments: Superb flat. Very well located in the historic Porto. Everything was within a few minutes of walking distance. Flat was quiet although the street is busy.

name: ABEL'S IN DOWNTOWN - THE PLACE TO BE 2 OF 2
comments:
Appartement tr√®s agr√©able, spacieux et parfaitement situ√© dans Porto.

name: Yellow Room -Bonjardim Guest House, Downtown Porto
comments: We had a wonderful stay in the yellow room! Pedro was so helpful with all requests especially great places to eat and drink! All of the suggestions were amazing! Check in was a breeze! The place is located about 10-20 minute walk from most things, however, the area is so nice and quiet and the walking made us see more of the non tourist parts of the city! We had a great stay and would definitely stay there again! Thank you for being so helpful and kind!

name: Bombarda 1F - Cozy Studio in Art District by LovelyStay
comments: Alles super

name: Charming Family House with Garden (6981/AL)
comments: The locality of the house is superb, very close to the river and very quiet. Not in the centre but there are enough ways to get to the centre easily. Also a small lovely garden to enjoy breakfast or dinner. Big supermarket nearby. All in all, good choice!

name: GuestReady - CastleRock Pub - 1st Back
comments: Great location for a great price. Host is responsive.

name: Casulo Loft - Oporto Downtown
comments: The flat is beautiful, bright, spacious, and clean. It's very central, and although it's directly next to a large building being renovated, the location is worth it! In addition to the place, the hospitality Edu showed was unparalleled. We were so appreciative of the time Edu spent with us upon check-in to share with us many insider tips to make our stay in Porto unforgettable!

name: Bright 3BR Flat w/ AC in City Center by LovelyStay
comments: Lovely apartment in the city centre of Porto. Good communication when needed. We had a nice experience!

name: Verry COZY room(House of Music Street/Near S.E.F)
comments: Better than advertised. Warm and very functional. Just respect his house rules, which are very normal and fair. He‚Äôs very welcoming.

name: Cedofeita Mezzanine with Terrace
comments: A very nice and cozy appartment. Perfect for a couple. Quiet neibourghood and close to city center of Porto with many shops and cafes.  A very nice and friendly host.

name: Porto Luxury Suite
comments: Very nice stay at Lurdes & Ad√©rito's beautiful residence. Room was top, you kind of feel like you're staying in a pretigious 19th century hotel since it's a big 3 story house and you have plenty of space and intimacy. Walkable distance to the center, metro and bus. Ad√©rito was very easy and funny to talk to. If you strike a conversation with him, he's very knowledgeable about Porto city and it's history. Overall, tudu bem. Obrigado!

name: Agradable Room Style
comments:
If you can find an opening with Elis, reserve it! As a student traveling here for a short trip and arriving late at night, I couldn't have picked a better place or a better host.
Although Elis was not there (had an emergency trip), she arranged it so that I could still stay at her place. She provided excellent communication throughout the process. Her friend, Mirko, hosted me instead and was amazing! I arrived later than expected and Mirko patiently awaited. The next day he provided a fantastic breakfast and even helped me plan my sightseeing adventure, marking key locations on a big map. I cannot thank Mirko enough.
The location allows you to walk to the historic area (roughly 20-30 mins) or you can take the metro (10 min walk). I was able to travel from the airport and to the train station easily from the metro near Elis' place.
The accommodations were very comfortable, very clean and the location extremely convenient; however, the best part of my stay was definitely the kindness shown by Elis and Mirko. Thank you again for opening your home to me, Elis. Stay here--you won't be disappointed.

name: CL√âRIGOS PURPLE (Double micro studio)
comments:
Chambre petite mais pas derangeant pour n'y passer que la nuit.
Les mouettes sont tr√®s bruyantes et pas seulement le matin, la nuit √©galement. Nous n'avons pas eu de chance, des travaux ont eu lieu juste en bas du logement. C'√©tait tr√®s bruyant et les ouvriers Portugais commencent √† travailler √† 7h le matin ! J'ai du dormir avec des bouchons d'oreille.
Sinon la chambre est relativement bien √©quip√©e et la salle de bain correcte.
Le m√©nage est en apparence bien fait. Il ne faut pas regarder dans les d√©tails.
Au regard du prix, cela reste un logement correct avec un emplacement central.

name: O Nosso Cantinho
comments:
Nous recommandons vivement ce logement.
Tres propre.
Les centres historiques et anim√©s de Porto et Gaia sont accessibles rapidement par les transports en commun.
Nous avons pass√© un tr√®s bon s√©jour.
Delfina √©tant toujours disponible et r√©active pour nous informer.
Nous conseillons ce logement.üòä

name: Porto Center - Indian Soul
comments: It was extremely nice to stay in Maria's house. Great location with good restaurants and coffee shops. I highly recommend Confeitaria Eiffel near the main road with delicious coffee and fresh pastries every day. In overall everything was perfect. Highly recommended !

name: Para√≠so Corner House
comments:
Great stay at Christine & Miguel's apartment! Everything was clean and it was easy to access with the key locker. Nice advices given too.. thank you.
The terrace was definitely the main event for us !! So nice for breakfast.
Thank you very much!

name: Porto Beach Apartment by LovelyStay
comments:
We stayed in this apartment for three weeks with our little daughter and her grandparents.
Porto is a lovely city and has a lot to offer. The flat is in the most beautiful part of it and has almost everything you need for a relaxing holiday.
We couldn‚Äôt get enough of the evenings on the balcony overlooking the sunset on the ocean. It was truly unique to live there.
The flat is spacious and has a cosy interior ( which has been getting a little old and used over the years). The kitchen was well equipped and the layout of the facility is great. The bedrooms are very cool even on hot days and quiet. Sadly during our last days a club two houses away opened again after Corona lockdown and played really loud music that kept us awake. Only the bathrooms need more maintenance as the paint in both shower and tub came off and a little mold was visible. Since we didn‚Äôt want to bath our daughter in there the office brought us a baby bath which helped in that matter.
Other than that we had a good base for various activities but would have liked a vacuum cleaner and complementary cleaning as we stayed for such a long time.

comments: Great location and a spectacular view. However, the accommodation is in need of a facelift and the pictures suggest it is nicer than it actually is. For example, the sofa in the lounge is covered with a throw to hide that most of the seat cushions/frame don‚Äôt have covers. One is just a dirty looking sponge square. This place could be amazing with some TLC and a bit of vision, but sadly I think the owners are resting on their laurels and it is being sold on the view alone. Top tip for staying in this central area is to bring ear plugs. In the summer it is too hot to sleep with the windows closed (there isn‚Äôt air-con) and it can be very noisy with street noise and seagulls.

The place was clean overall, the kitchen well equipped. The room was tidy, with heater as it was a little cold. There is a little garden with tables and chairs,  and beautiful flowers where you can enjoy your breakfast in the sun. I would recommend this place to anyone who stays in Porto for a few days to explore the city.

comments: The location of the studio was excellent. The view was beautiful as well. It is rather small but nice for a short stay. There was construction going on right outside and occasionally the smell of sewage - neither of which could be helped by our host. It was clean and we were comfortable during our two nights.

comments: Exatamente como no an√∫ncio, √≥timo custo - benef√≠cio, recomendo!

comments:

name: ‚úî Downtown, Clean, Silent | Balcony| Self Check in
comments: Nice, large and very clean appartement and not far away from downtown and railway station. I liked to stay here and recommand it.

name: Janelas de S√£o Bento by Porto City Hosts
comments: We really enjoyed our stay in Porto.  The location of the apartment was close to many of the things we wanted to see and we were able to walk everywhere we went.  The apartment was clean and well supplied and the bed was comfortable.  The check-in was very easy and went smoothly.  The communication throughout was great.  The bathroom supplies (hand soap and shampoo) had been overlooked but were provided promptly when we notified the hosts.  The apartment is on the street side and we did not hear the train station at all.  There was some street noise, but only during the day.  The sleeping area can be closed off from the main part of the apartment in case one person needs to get up earlier or can't sleep.  I would suggest the guest check on whether the city tax is due or already included in the payment a day or two before checkout because it wasn't clear whether we needed to pay it or not.  The receptacle for payment is there, but there are no instructions.  We would certainly consider staying here again on our next visit to Porto and would consider renting from Porto City Hosts if we were looking for something different.

name: Art & City II
comments:
This one is easy to review:
- good contact with the owner via email
- nice appartment
- excellent location in the center
- great wifi connection

One negative point: the weather wasn't that great, but I guess that's not Marco's fault...

name: Porto By Douro Loft - Street view
comments: Tout √©tait excellent, tr√®s bel appartement, bien situ√©. Tout est simplement parfait!

name: Porto RiverView flat
comments:
We stayed with 3 adults for 5 nights in this apartment in June 2017. We loved our stay. The communication with Pedro was quick and to the point. The apartment was very spacious and clean. All modern appliances were there. For those who want to cook diner in the apartment do not bother to bring any cooking supplies yourself because everthing you need is there. The appliances in the kitchen are new. You can park your car in the garage of the apartment. The tram/subway stops across the frontdoor. Bakeries and suermarket are just around the corner. Mind you that the address is not in Porto but in Vila Nova de Gaia!
We can definitely recommend this apartment.

name: Jo√£o de Deus Apart. {METRo Station}
comments: Very nice and comfortable apartment near the corte ingles in porto. The location is great, near the metro station that will take you in 5 min. Into the old town. Apartment is large, clean and Rui was very helpful with everything we needed. We had a great time.

name: Opo Arte Apartment with terrace and A/C
comments:
A perfect "home base" while visiting Porto!

Sara and Hugo were responsive, flexible and incredibily helpful. The well appointed apartment had the latest brochures so that we could easily plan our days. Hugo walked us through a map of the city, which helped us quickly familiarize. The apartment was quiet, spacious, and had everything we needed to rest after long days of hills, stairs, and other touring! Lots of nearby food and drink options made living rather easy. A post office across the street allowed us to send postcards, and lots of little spots for breakfast or a nightcap allowed those little comforts that make a difference.

While it was rainy during the stay, the terrace looked lovely--and would have been put to good use otherwise!

If ever in Porto again, will be sure to stay here.

name: practical and comfortable apartment with garden
comments:
Cesar was a very nice host! He gave us many tips for our stay in Porto.
The appartment was clean and new.
You can cook very well in the kitchen and relax nicely in the garden. The apartment is close to the center.
We enjoyed our stay very much!

name: Porto Loft 0.1 - Gil Vicente Charming Guesthouse
comments: Nous n'avons malheureusement pas pu rencontrer Belina, mais elle √©tait tr√®s pr√©sente par message si nous avions besoin de quoique ce soit.  Le studio est tr√®s fonctionnel, propre, agr√©able, id√©alement situ√© pr√®s du m√©tro et bien d√©cor√© ! Je recommande fortement de passer un s√©jour chez Belina.

name: My Porto Loft I - Red & Black
comments: Great place to stay in Porto. Very close to the center and the apartment is very well suited for longer periods if you want to cook for yourself.

name: GuestReady - Santa Catarina Residence ii
comments: Apartamento muy fiel a las fotos. La localizaci√≥n es espectacular. Todo muy limpio. Tuvimos que recoger las llaves en un sitio diferente , nos vino bien dado que no sab√≠amos el horario de llegada exacto. Recomendado

name: Gold & Grey Loft Almada
comments:
As indicated by the site description and traveler reviews, this is a great Airbnb and an excellent value.
Fully renovated, charming decor, and located in a great spot within walking distance to restaurants and main attractions.
It was obvious that our host, Maria, is very proud of her country and city as she did everything she could to ensure we enjoyed our stay. You will be hard pressed to find a better Airbnb host.
If you are 'on the fence' as to whether to include Porto in your travel plans, I would suggest you jump off it....this is a truly wonderful city!

name: Oportobestview-Garden
comments: Fantastic view, nice house, had everything provided. Pretty good location. Jorge was there to show us around and was open for additional requests. Jorge, thank you for the Portwine bottle.

name: Historic & Sunny‚òÄÔ∏è Top Location ‚ûîGastronomic Center
comments: We loved the apartment, great location, friendly and responsive hosts. We did not like the fact that the bed was so uncomfortable that we couldn‚Äôt sleep on it. The hosts informed us they were replacing it. I hope so for the next guests.

name: S2 Private Room in Porto
comments: Would come back to Alessandro‚Äôs place. Great host , comfortable room.

name: Plaza 2.2 - Charming GuestHouse
comments: Wonderful place to stay about a 20 minute walk from Porto city center - neighborhood felt very safe and was located right across the street from a supermarket and a small park. Plaza and Belina were incredibly responsive and professional. Great hosts and great place.

name: GET AN AUTENTIC HISTORIC FLAT
comments: tolle Wohnung in zentraler Lage. Von hier ist alles zu Fu√ü gut zu erreichen.

name: Quarto, hospedado por Saide

name: Home sweet little home
comments:
Maria is a very sociable and friendly host.

The appartment is conform at the description she made, it has everything you need. It is close to bus and metro station, and even by walk to the city centre. A direct bus line is aiming to the airport, 5 minutes walk from the flat. There are restaurants very close, some bakeries and 2 supermarkets.
We definitely had some great time in Porto and Maria was one of the reason.
Go for it ;)

comments: This apartment was perfectly located in Porto, close to restaurants, bars, and all of the sightseeing in the city. The place was clean and well designed. Would definitely recommend if you‚Äôre in Porto!

Vraiment un beau s√©jour gr√¢ce √† vous. La Maison est situ√©e √† 18mn en voiture de Porto, tr√®s calme, et avec l'avantage de pouvoir prendre les transports en commun pour s'y rendre. The house was very comfortable and clean and lots of places to chill out and relax away from the communal living area on the ground floor. Although there is no garden there are three balconies and the  proximity to the beach meant that we didn‚Äôt miss having more outside space. Overall a great stay in a beautiful and vibrant city.

comments: Filipa was extremely friendly and helpful, leaving us excellent local tips for Porto, many of which we tried in our short stay. I would happily recommend her place to other travellers.

name: Miradouro - TownHouse with a breathtaking VIEW
comments:
Really lovely place and stunning views. Also Joana was very helpful and responsive. The place is lovely.

However, the patio doors wouldn‚Äôt open which was very frustrating and meant you had to go up to a bedroom and down and couldn‚Äôt use as an extension of the living area. I appreciate that Joana apologised, but offering to get someone round to fix it might have been a good gesture.

There are quite a few things broken in the apartment, door handles falling off and even shower handles! Also the shower isn‚Äôt sealed so it leaks all over the floor.

But it is in a great location and the views are stunning!

I honestly think a handy man for half a day could fix 99% of the issues.

So it‚Äôs good, just misses out on excellent!

name: Casa 8 - Fontainhas Duplex          LIMPO & SEGURO
comments: We really enjoyed staying at Elvira's place. Everything was perfect :)

name: Casa Amarela - The Garden
comments:
Ana is a very warming host. Her suite is very cozy, clean and near to the city center. Highly recommend.

name: GuestReady - Office Residence 6
comments: The worst night i have ever head: we arrived after a long driving day and couldnt use the shower, couse the showerhead was covered with mould, the curtains rod was broken, the curtains supposed one day to be white were almost black and the carpet on the flor as well covered with dirt. Open electricity cabels at plugs and the smell as smth died inside the appartement. We tried to get a fresh air and opened the windows, but it was so loud outside and the the indoor building also was in so bad condition that i personally was afraid that some rats can come during the night inside. To our request to solve the problem with the shower we didnt get any answer untill we asked the airbnb about help and after that the host contact us and asked why we left the appartement, cause the problem was solved at the next day( when we already left). We never heard any apologies. So the pictures dont realy match the reality!!!!!!(at least of our room) Also the constantly promoting and advertisement messages filling up the chat‚Ä¶ and dont use the parking they recommend- 2,4 /hour, so we payed about 25‚Ç¨ for 1 night‚Ä¶.

name: AQR - Amalia Apartment
comments:
We really enjoy the position of the flat And the communication of our host And All the information that she gave us, And especially the late checking.
The flat was ok nice decoration really like the painting explaining All the lingo And the places, And appreciate the masks we got when we arrived.
But Just behind our Windows we can ear a cock (chicken) singing from 2 or 3 am to any hours of the day actually And the bathroom was not that clean.

name: Surf village
comments:
Suzana is such a wonderful host. She greeted us at 23:30 for check-in, answered all questions always, gave us a list of great places to visit, delicious pastels, surfing lesson was fun, drove us to the city and more. The towels, bathroom accessories, bed sheets, wi-fi - all good.

The double bed in our room was of two single beds tied together though.

The place is 5-10 minutes away from the beach by foot. The ocean isn't that warm though, you'd prefer to use a thermal suit even in summer. A supermarket is close by.

name: City Double View
comments:
Tudo bom!

-Appartement id√©alement plac√©, spacieux et d√©cor√© avec bon go√ªt.

name: suites com terra√ßo
comments:
Lucia and her husband were amazing hosts.
I felt so welcomed and cared for.
The room was very clean, super comfy bed, nice hot shower and great bathroom facilities. I loved the little terrace where I could drink my coffee in the morning.
My favourite place I‚Äôve stayed since being in Portugal. It was like a home away from home ü•∞

name: Lovely Flat in the Porto Center
comments: I would highly recommend this place to stay in Porto. It's a lovely apartment and it's like staying at home. It's in a very quiet area and easy walk into the centre. Laura is a very friendly and helpful host, she and Jorge gave us a very warm welcome when we arrived.

name: City center, Free Parking, fantastic view
comments: A lovely, well-positioned and well-appointed apartment in Porto!  My host was so lovely; personally meeting me to show me around the building and the apartment and taking the time to find out my interests, make some recommendations and mark places to go on a city map.  Much appreciated!  I had no trouble walking around Porto from the apartment, with no need for transport.  I did have a car with me, and I had great piece of mind that it was safe and secure in the underground private parking spot offered with the apartment throughout my stay.  I would highly recommend this apartment to anyone staying in Porto!

name: Feel Porto Downtown City Roofs
comments: Great appartement, very well equiped for a citytrip! We loved the location and the interior of the house. Great hosts, very friendly and helpful. We used the offered transfer and it was perfect. My only comment would be that the extra (folding) bed (we were with 7 adults) was a bit small for two adults. Nothing problematic but when you travel with 7 adults you might want to ask if you can have extra sheets and use the sofa bed in the living room. Overall i would definately reccomend this appertment!

name: Marys Den r
comments: Prijs kwaliteit super accommodatie. Badkamer aan de kleine kant. Airco werkte goed. Geen geluidsoverlast. Goed bed. Dicht bij metrostation.

name: *NEW* Riverside 2 Bedroom Apartment by DA'HOME
comments: Fantastic air bnb in a wonderful location of Miragaia, less than a 10 minute walk to Ribiera. It was very comfortable and was equipped with everything we could possibly need. The hosts were very helpful and couldn‚Äôt do more for us too. There is a bus and tram stop directly outside the apartment so this is very useful to get around, recommend getting the 500 bus up to the coast to the fishing town of Matosinhos where we had amazing fresh fish. Couldn‚Äôt recommend this apartment more, the perfect base for a trip to Porto.

name: Lovely Flat in the Porto Center
comments: Laura is a wonderful host.   She was waiting for us at the apt with Port, fresh flowers and organic vegetables and eggs from her garden.  There were thoughtful items in the fridge. She spent time showing us points of interest on the map and orienting us to the neighbourhood and beyond.  The apt is clean and light and comfortable.  The bed is very good, the shower too and the kitchen equipped for small meals.  The apt is in a quiet neighbourhood and we easily walked everywhere. There is an excellent cafe in around the corner called Brando with really good coffee. This was an excellent experience all around.  100% recommendation.  Laura is an absolutely lovely host and her place reflects the same.

name: Apartament for Natural People's
comments: Perfect location close to the train station S√£o Bento. Everything is reachable by foot. Also check out Ana‚Äòs restaurant, it‚Äôs really good

name: Casa do Olival Apartamento Acolhedor Perto dos Cl√©rigos.
comments: Dulce was an amazing host, and made our check in completely seamless. She went the extra mile in every way even coming for a drive with us to park our vehicle. The apartment was perfect, well appointed, thought out and sparkling clean. Our best Air BNB experience in Portugal. Thanks again Dulce, I'll be back.

name: Inn Oporto Old Town - Apartments
comments: A very nice place in a very central location. Just beware that being so close to a major train station has its pros and cons. It can be very loud and we had trouble sleeping both nights. There was also construction on the roads nearby which made it difficult to sleep.

name: Cozy Loft in Downtown II
comments: A beautiful spacious studio in the heart of historic Porto. I stayed for a week and everything went smoothly. It's a short walk to the metro station, major sights and great restaurants for all budgets. Maria met me at check-in and offered tips for local sightseeing. She was available throughout the stay to answer questions and she also even worked with me to extend my stay in one of her other properties. Thanks Maria!

Het is erg jammer dat de douchekop niet opgehangen kan worden en het kastdeurtje n de keuken is niet vastgemaakt. Het appartement mist details van aandacht. Het is een verhuur appartement met basics en niets extra's.

comments: 5 estrelas

name: Mouzinho 134 - Historical Center - Blue
comments:
Lovely 3 Bedroom apartment in the heart of Porto.

We had a great stay at Mouzinho 134 ‚ÄúBlue Room‚Äù which is a 3 bedroom apartment on the top floor of a very centrally located building in Porto. Two full bathrooms and a very well stocked kitchen were nice to have. There is a drip coffee maker with a supply of ground coffee which went really well with the fresh bread delivered to your door every morning at 8:00. The new windows make the apartment almost sound proof to the traffic noise. Very well located as all the tourist hi-lights of Porto are no more than a 10 minute walk away. Communication with Eugenia was quick and easy and the the check in process very easy. Lots of room and very comfortable for two couples. Would come back in a heartbeat.

name: Wild garden house- city center

The square right outside the apartment has an amazing atmosphere and great restaurants! Our favourite stay in Portugal!! Not to mention the amazing price!

name: CC Downtown Palace - G
comments: What an amazing apartment. We were so central and walking distance to lovely shopping area. Bus station and hop-on hop-off buses. We loved our time in Porto.

name: Baixa24 - City Center Private Sun Deck Apt Room 4
comments: Mario was super hoster. Clean room and apartment, always reachable and helpful. Would recommend him again.

name: Ikebana VI - Charming apart  downtown Porto
comments: Logement proche du centre, √† 10 minutes de Torre de Clerigos. Plein de resto sympa aux alentours. Dans une art√®re commer√ßante pi√©tonne, il donne c√¥t√© cour donc est tr√®s calme. De bons conseils donn√©s par Ana pour les restos et le petit dej.

name: Mezzanine na Rua do Almada
comments:
The apartment was absolutely gorgeous in a great location! Beds were super comfortable, fantastic shower, well equipped kitchen and lovely hosts. The stairs to the loft are quite steep, but manageable.
Unfortunately we didn‚Äôt meet In√™s, but her friendly dad provided a smooth (early) check in with a complimentary bottle of vinho verde (delicious)!
There‚Äôs a baggage storage place just down the street that came in handy after check out while we waited for our late flight!
I would definitely stay here again next time I visit beautiful Porto.

name: Aurora Mezzanine by LovelyStay

comments: Fabulous location, you can walk everywhere from there. Liliana is the best host, very professional. The apartment super clean and modern. In the kitchen there is everything one needs to prepare meals. Liliana added few touches to the apartment so the visitors feel welcome and at home. Good quality mattress, sheets and towels. We definitely will stay in Liliana's apartment if we go back to Porto. Highly recommended.

name: Vale Formoso indoor terrace
comments: Great value for money. The apartment is a bit far from the city Center but Uber is anyway cheap. We stayed in the apartment with six people - in two bedrooms and on one couch in the living room. Enough space to have dinner and chill with six people. It was a bit loud in the bedrooms since the apartment is located directly at a Main Street with lots of cars.

name: Urban cabin
comments: Localiza√ß√£o muito boa, muito central. Facilidade em hor√°rios tanto de check in como check out, comunica√ß√£o muito boa. Casa muito limpa e acolhedora.

name: Stay in central Porto in stylish 1bd apt w/Parking
comments: Good location, perfect place.

name: ABEL'S @ CAMPO 24 DE AGOSTO - 1 OF 6

name: Belas Artes 2 Porto Apartment - by Guest SPA
comments: Susana et Pedro ont √©t√© des h√¥tes merveilleux en tout point ! Un accueil chaleureux, une gentillesse infinie et une aide tr√®s pr√©cieuse ! Un appartement √† l‚Äôimage de ses propri√©taires c‚Äôest √† dire irr√©prochable ! Proche de tout (transports, tourisme, supermarch√©‚Ä¶), ce fut un immense plaisir et le meilleur choix ! Nous les remercions √©norm√©ment ! Au top du top !!

name: HAVEN 249 Passos Manuel
comments: This is a wonderful apartment in a great location. A few thinks to note. The building in the photos is NOT the building you will staying in, it‚Äôs the view from the apartment. And the air conditioner was a bit wonky as we needed to keep the windows open to vent the portable ac unit while it was functioning, not a deal breaker but something to note. Also all the linens and soft goods have been washed with a heavily perfumed soap so if you are sensitive to that please take note, certainly a sign that they are clean.

name: Apartamento na Praia, Vila do Conde.
comments:
Appartement conforme √† la description, proche de la mer mais sans nuisance sonore et proche d un lidl ce qui n oblige pas √† prendre la voiture pour la moindre petite course.
Terrasse exceptionelle!
Nous y retournerons sans hesiter!

name: Verry COZY room(House of Music Street/Near S.E.F)
comments: Luis is a friendly host and offersall things that we need. The room is pretty clean and comfortable, Mytsu is cute as well. We've spent a happy time at this place.

name: Sunset Guest House
comments:
Appartement tr√®s bien agenc√© avec une belle vue sur la mer, Sonia est tr√®s √† l'√©coute de ses clients
Une tr√®s belle location au nord de Porto

name: Maredimo Village Porto   casa Eiffel
comments:
Good quiet refuge in a nice, more neighborhood-like, local area‚Äî but it was a little further from the true center of historic Aveiro than described. The ‚Äúnearby‚Äù metro is a bit of a hike up some steep inclines, but is a doable adventure. Cute place, though a little ‚Äòhard-edged‚Äô super-modern design-wise. The renovation is so Ultra- ultra-modern that the decor feels a little ‚Äòcold‚Äô‚Äî (unless you like living in the pages of Architectural Digest.)
What may have been an historic house for the poor shows no traces of its origins, and this one is actually out on the street and to the side of the courtyard where little village complex that is depicted in the listing.
A couple of area rugs and more moveable, less heavy side-table (downstairs) could make things more useable and cozy‚Ä¶ Instructions for how to collapse the sofa bed would have been helpful. And SOAP!!

name: Room with 2 Sing Beds and  Private WC Inside

The city center is 15-20 mins by walking, which is totally fine. The only thing was, we didn‚Äôt have that much luck with the weather so after having some drinks at the main street it‚Äôs still a walk back home. But that‚Äôs everywhere you go or stay in a city üòä

name: GuestReady - Guindais Well House
comments: This was a huge space - a big kitchen with everything we needed to cook a big group dinner and bathrooms for everyone. There were enough bedrooms that our group of 7 had lots of options for how to sleep. It was the perfect location: 5 minutes (downhill) to get to the river, 5 minutes to get to the bride, 5 minutes to the train station, and about 10 minutes to everything else. It felt authentically Porto and rustic: you walk out the front door to a cobblestone street and a view of a castle. The host check in and concierge services were a great touch - we got a full tour of the home and our host made sure there were enough towels and hot water before he left. He also gave us tons of recommendations and maps which led us to really great food in Porto we may not have otherwise found. The concierge service meant we could drop our bags off first thing in the morning which essentially gave us another full day of exploring. It's clear that everyone we worked with loved their city and were excited to share it with visitors. Obrigada!

comments:
Staying at David and Sinda‚Äôs place for 3 months was one of the best experience of my life. It felt like living with your own family, that you actually like. It‚Äôs really much more than typical Airbnb.

They and their children ‚Äî Gabriella and Carolina ‚Äî are one of the nicest people I‚Äôve met. To prove the point: they took us with them to supermarkets, for shopping, to the ocean, to movies, to cafes and elsewhere. They always shared fresh fruits from the garden, medicine when we got sick, homemade desserts etc.

You‚Äôll love this place if you‚Äôre looking to:
- spend some time at village with cats, dogs, ducks and horses;
- enjoy a quiet and calm life;
- meet wonderful people, who are not only welcoming and nice, but smart and very interesting to talk to;
- have a perfect remote place to work.

We‚Äôre sure to come back here one day, muito obrigado for everything!

comments:
Sonia greeted us in person and took the time to explain everything in her apartment and also gave us many recommendations for places to visit in Porto and where to eat. She is an excellent host, quick to reply to emails and helpful as well.

The apartment is in an excellent location, about 50 metres from the waterfront in the heart of the historic centre of Porto. I don‚Äôt think you can get better than this for location. We found many delicious restaurants within close walking distance, one of them is literally 35 steps from the front door (we counted), and the bridge to get over to Vila Nova de Gaia is a few hundred metres away, for visiting the port houses.

The pictures of Sonia‚Äôs place do not do it justice, it is actually bigger than it looks and has everything we needed for a great trip. Thank you Sonia.

Foz itself is a charming beachfront community and the Foz boardwalk is only 5 minutes away. We ate at some great restaurants over by the water and enjoyed our time there. We also were delighted with the city of Porto which was only a 30 minute bus ride away on the 500 bus.

Obrigadu Nuno and Ana!!

name: Sunset Relaxing Apt with terrace, parking & bikes
comments:
Sara and Hugo were very responsive before and after booking. We arrived around 3am, later than expected and Hugo had stayed to ensure we got in and sorted, so a big thank you for that. He had a map of the city and picked out a few spots we could visit.

The place is very spacious. It was sparkling clean. There is an upstairs with a double bed, large space, small tv, balcony and toilet/bathroom. The downstairs has a larger TV, large fridge, cooking essentials/cutlery.
There is a garage for parking a car and 2 bikes which are available for you to use (we didn't).

If i had to pick out some flaws it would be that it is slightly out of the centre, however this meant it was quiet at night and with a car we were able to get around the city without any issues. The car park slight squeeze to get the car in as there is a bit of a drive (10/20metres?) but you just need to be careful.

If you don't have a car, there are the bikes, as well as this there is a bus stop right opposite the flat. There is a small supermarket a minutes walk away which was great to get a few bits.

Loved the flat, great hosts. Would use again.

name: Liiiving in Porto | Cosy Experience Apartment II
comments: A group of eight 'middle-aged' (70's) seniors used Airbnb for the first time while traveling to Portugal and Spain. All  rentals exceeded expectations, but the 'Liiiving Porto' experience was by far the best! Abel was tasked by LP to shepherd the flock, and he did so with great enthusiasm. He even escorted the ladies to the local mercado to serve as their translator. He texted us daily to ensure that his flock was doing well. He is a great asset to LP. From our experience with the company and the way they treated us when our first reservation encountered an unexpected cancellation and subsequent rebooking, LP has shown itself to be great company to rent from. Should we return to Porto, we'll book with LP, and we'll be recommending them to our friends for their vacations.

comments:
What is particularly fun about this place is that it feels slightly away from where the bulk of Porto tourism is taking place. Whether true or not, the bars and restaurants that line this street ‚Äì and not so close as to be a nuisance ‚Äì felt like the kinds of places where locals would hang out.

That's a neat thing after spending time near the river and on other crowded pedestrian-friendly avenues. Oh, and while you're here, do check out the host's app. What a cool thing to provide to guests! It's wonderfully simple and will give you at least a few gems outside of the guide books.

Fair warning: If you have a lot of luggage, prepare for a climb. The apartment is up a couple of levels. But when you get up and in, enjoy the stylish spaciousness of it, then go out and have some fun, then return to a comfy bed. Nice, enjoyable, comfortable. What more can you ask for?

Jose was very helpful with transportation and recommendations. You must eat at Gazala and order the spicy hotdog and a Super Boc. Sounds like nothing but it was fantastic. They only take cash.

Be aware of many stairs inside the apartment. Also outside to walk anywhere. We found it no problem ( all in our 60‚Äôs) but for anyone with mobility issues it would be difficult.

name: Luxury Apartment Riverwiew Garden
comments:
This apartment was exactly as described and looked exactly like the photos. I suppose the only thing that was not clear when I booked is that the apartment we booked was one of 7 in the same building and sharing the same terrace. I knew there was more than one but not 7. However, when we were there this was not a problem at all and we were the only ones using the beautiful terrace that has spectacular views over the river. even if everyone had wanted to use it there was plenty of space and seating.
It is a little way out of the main city area but we knew that and we're happy to walk 25 minutes in each day although there is a tram you can use.
There is a good supermarket at the bottom of the road where there are also recycling bins which we also used.
Marcos recommended Graham's as a good place to try port tasting and the tour was excellent. It is a bit more of a hike to reach but worth it.
Marcos was a charming and helpful host and when we found there was no corkscrew in the apartment, there was one at our door when we returned from dinner. Excellent service!
There was modern quiet air conditioning, nice bedding and towels and just enough of the things you need like shampoo, washing up liquid etc which are the small touches we appreciate.

name: Vegan Topfloor- Douro, Ribeira - free parking
comments: There were three of us and the two bedrooms 1 1/2 bath worked well for us. There are 48 steps up to the apartment and it is about half way up the hill from the river, so it can be a bit of exercise, but the views are worth it. Street noise is bad in the evening and in the morning--closing all the windows helps--but I slept well. The linen sheets were great. Compared to other Airbnbs we have stayed at, the kitchen was a bit light on "extras". Food markets were reasonably close and of course you are right above all of the Port tasting taverns. We walked everywhere, even out to the old fishing area on the Atlantic. Anytime you immediately start calling the place you are staying "home" you know that it is a good experience. We would stay there again. Oh--the free parking area is a couple of blocks walk, but was easy in and out. FYI, if we had not been traveling before and after our stay in Porto we would definitely not have had a car--local transport is easy,

name: New Design Mezzanine /Porto Center

We loved our stay here in August 2017! The apartment is in an awesome neighbourhood close to many shops and restaurants. There is a good coffee shop right at the end of the block. We loved the layout of the apartment and it is nicely decorated. The master bedroom in the upper loft is really cool! The host is very communicative and helpful, and answered questions right away and thoroughly. You will not regret booking this place because it is in the perfect location - you can walk down to the Douro River for a boat tour or wine tasting very easily from here. It is nice that the apartment is in the historic neighbourhood but has been newly renovated and decorated. Book this place if it is available!

We had a rental car with us and were able to pull up to the unit for loading and unloading. You can't park outside the unit because it is a narrow street made more for pedestrians. It wasn't a problem because the host presented us with 3 different parking options. We chose a unground parkade that is about a block away and cost $15 a day for secured parking with in/out privileges 24 hrs. Please note this was the more expensive option.

Overall it was a nice stay, but I'd say definitively not worth the price which is not that cheap compared to the average of the city (we also had to throw away our garbage).

comments: Perfect for a short city centre break - comfortable, clean and well-equipped apartment in the very heart of Porto. Secure and spacious, there is a decent sized bedroom, small dining area and a kitchen/living room (which actually has a fold out sofa bed) Short walk to the riverside and all major attractions. Easy to find, good communication from the owners. Wifi and everything else you need. Previous reviews and the description we booked said it was bed and breakfast which led to a little confusion as this is seemingly not offered any more. Recomended.

name: Bed in 12 Bed Mixed Dorm
comments:
Pontos positivos: atendimento maravilhoso, localiza√ß√£o central, dormit√≥rio bem espa√ßoso.
Pontos negativos: rua muiiiito barulhenta durante toda a madrugada, n√£o tem varal, n√£o tem fog√£o, e a cama √© pequena.

name: Violet House
comments: Tudo √© muito bom neste apartamento, mas para n√≥s o principal foi o fato de ter f√°cil acessibilidade, garagem e a localiza√ß√£o excelente! Eu tenho dificuldades locomotar e minha m√£e, que estava junto, possui 85 anos, ent√£o foi bem importante ter elevador e f√°cil acesso tanto ao apartamento como a garagem tamb√©m, bem como o fato dos banheiros n√£o possuirem banheira, √© box normal como aqui no Brasil. Portanto fica a dica, este apartamento √© √≥timo tamb√©m para pessoas deficientes e idosas. Tamb√©m √© importante referir que na parte inferior do pr√©dio tem um supermercado Pingo Doce, que √© uma grande facilidade! No mais o apartamento √© muito bom e √© exatamente o que est√° no an√∫cio. Podem alugar sem medo!

name: Welcome to my city 2
comments: Fantastic, stylish and comfortable flat in a great central location. Has all mod cons. We would definitely return. Christina was really friendly and helpful. A real gem in Porto!

name: GuestReady - The Roof from Antoine et Antoinette
comments: Great place in a fantastic location with nice views and outdoor spaces.

name: Loureiro Villas - J
comments: Really well located accommodation and friendly people helping you around!

name: The Porto Getaway - Free Parking by LovelyStay
comments: We had a great stay. The airbnb is spacious and well located.

name: Ribeira Oporto Apartment II (Renewed 2021)
comments: Super helpful! Met us at the apartment, on time, provided map + info of nearby cool local spots

name: Admire Vibrant, Mid-century Style at a Historic Retreat
comments: We had a fantastic time here, we even extended our stay for an additional night. The location was excellent we were able to walk around to all the restaurants shopping and sites. Our favorite place to eat was a place that serves brunch all day named Obio Organic Cafe it served yummy porridge and delicious eggs and mushrooms saut√©ed chard and beautiful coffees. The hosts met us when we arrived and walked us thru everything. The unit was gorgeous with everything you need in an air bnb.

name: Oporto Blue Trindade/Magical Citycenter Apartment!
comments: An amazing host.  I needed assistance several times and he was always super helpful, friendly, and communicative.

name: The Happiness House
comments: Ana y su madre son unas grandes anfitrionas. El apartamento es incre√≠ble y la ubicaci√≥n perfecta. Es amplio y luminoso. Se puede ir andando a la zona hist√≥rica sin problema, pues el metro y el bus est√°n en la misma esquina de la calle. Una zona muy tranquila.

name: Oporto Downtown Loft - Cl√©rigos
comments:
Joanna was a great host, I didn't meet her but she answered all my emails and questions very quickly, her mum helped us with the check in and explained everything, she even helped me to carry my heavy luggage and how to move around in the city and the best places to go.
The space is this cute self-contained apartment that has a lot of great details (good pillows, toiletries, information, fan) that make a difference when you are travelling and make an airbnb place especial.
The location couldn't be better, just walking distance to everything! It could be a little bit noisy at night time, but nothing that a good pair of earplugs can improve.
keep in mind that the apartment it's in a 4th floor and there isn't a lift. So carrying heavy luggage is not that fun. But otherwise a great stay, thanks Joanna!

name: Studio with terrace and river view by YoursPorto
comments: The place which it was situated was super good as it was in the city centre close to - almost - everything. Still, I enjoyed the terrace the most as the view from there was astonishing.

name: FH4 - Studio in Downtown Porto
comments: Amazing apartment in a great location. the hosts are very nice and explain everything well.

name: Oporto Sao Lazaro Apartment
comments:
Das Apartment von Ana hat eine wirklich tolle Lage und man ist schnell in der Innenstadt, wobei die direkte Nachbarschaft auch einiges zu bieten hat.
Nachts ist es sehr laut. Die Fenster sind nur einfach verglast und auch sonst ist die Wohnung nicht so gut isoliert und dementsprechend sehr hellh√∂rig. Auch bei der Ausstattung fehlen ein paar Dinge (scharfe Messer, Schneidebrett‚Ä¶).
Ansonsten ist es ein wirklich s√º√ües Zimmer, welches Ana wirklich seht sauber h√§lt.

name: Casa do Ros√°rio
comments: We had a perfect stay in Maria's apartment. It is the perfect place in Porto. Maria has renovated the old house in a very beautiful way. Every detail fits into the overall concept. When we visit Porto again, we would like to come back.

name: Infante Douro View
comments:
Stop looking and book this lovely Airbnb NOW! Beautifully remodeled spacious 2 bedroom apt in an old building right in the heart of the Ribiera. Elevator will take you up after walking around all day. Plenty of closet space, big comfy beds, living room and eating area. Extra towels, toiletries and pillows. And the view! Whether it is looking out front or back you can't beat it.
You can lay in bed and watch the lights twinkling across the river of the port houses. Little grocery just down the street to stock up on what you need. Taxi stand across the street if you need one. Have dinner at Jimao close by, you won't be disappointed. And you will be hard pressed to find a host as gracious as Ivan.

name: Trendy Home Studio in an Artsy Area
comments: Tuvimos alg√∫n malentendido a la llegada y lo solucionaron r√°pidamente, pero a√∫n as√≠,  habr√≠a cosas a mejorar. La limpieza se podr√≠a mejorar (pintar algunas paredes, la ducha, el sof√°...) Est√° en un barrio muy tranquilo. Pedro muy amable.

name: GuestReady - Gemini Apartment
comments:
This is a perfect apartment for a short visit. Very, very clean. A great location and wonderful service from Porto Concierge Staff.

We would definitely be happy to return here and recommend it to any interested people.

name: Faisama Apartments ‚Ä¢ Duplex with 2 bedrooms
comments: Perfect location, quiet, very convenient automatic check-in system.

name: River & Ocean‚Äì Cozy independent Studio
comments:
PERFECT. !

We were in Porto for 2 days and we felt like it was our home. A cozy room for 2, with a private shower, kitchenette, couch and access to the terrace at a pocket-friendly price. What more do u want!!

Gabriela has been an amazing host before and during the stay at Porto. She has been so particular about every small detail. Communicating about Porto's attractions, transport information from the apartment etc was done much before our arrival. This made it so smooth and convenient for us to find the place.

Hats off to her professionalism in handling this. To provide a homely atmosphere and a hotel like organization at the same time isn't an easy task. I must say, if it wasn't for her, our stay at Porto would havent been so smooth and uneventful.

name: Seventyset Flats - Mezzanine and Terrace
comments: Julia‚Äôs apartment is exactly as described.  A charming studio, very clean and in a vibrant area of Porto.  Her communication was beyond great!

name: Oporto City Cottage
comments: Bel appartement  bien situ√© et fonctionnel

name: City Center Penthouse with 360¬∞ Terrace Steps from Cl√©rigos
comments: super logement pour 2 couples.

name: Porto Life Studio 1
comments: Pedro and Telmo were simply perfect. We got to meet Pedro and he had fresh cherries, bread, and orange juice waiting for us: a perfect welcoming. They were so helpful as they provided us with a map and spent an hour telling us where to go and what to do. The apartment is incredibly situated, just at the center, 10 minute walk from literally everywhere in Porto and it is so tastefully furnished. To anyone visiting Porto and looking for a place to stay, this it the apartment you're looking for!

name: Plaza 2.2 - Charming GuestHouse
comments: The place is spotless clean. Really really clean and room matches the photos. I didn't really use the kitchen much but it has everything - microwaveÔºåfridgeÔºåplatesÔºåcoffee machineÔºåcups etc. It's great that they have left the bottle of water. Wi-Fi is very weakÔºåI assume because all the guests are using itÔºåbut if you have your data usage - your staying here will be perfect.

name: Antas Place B
comments: üëå

name: Casa Prometeu
comments: Francisco is great host, very good at communicating. The house is very close to a metro station and visiting anywhere in Porto is very easy. I couldn't give full marks because of issues with the ventilation, which make impact the overall experience and make the venue less competitive in the price. I am confident the issue will be resolved .

name: Next to the Airport/up to 3 people double room
comments: Excellent accueil. Id√©al pour une arriv√©e tardive √† l'a√©roport. Propret√© irr√©prochable. Je recommande !

name: GuestReady - Gaia Gardens Apt 3
comments: Fantastic. Spacious and clean.

name: WARMLY PORTO
comments: A very comfortable stay with everything we needed. This was our second stay with Majordhome in Porto and we look forward to visiting again.

name: GuestReady - MusicHall - Yellow Submarine
comments: The place was amazing! We appreciated coffee and wine gift when we arrived. The place is well thought out especially Beatles theme. Definitely would recommend to everyone!

name: Duplex with Terrace | Ace Location - Clean & Safe
comments: The apartment was a bit smaller than we had thought BUT Sara made us feel really welcome, had good recommendations for us and the location of the apartment is just perfect. We really enjoyed our stay!

name: AQR - Garden Apartment
comments: Small but very confortable apartment. Clean and quiet close to the center. Nice terrace and very kind and helpfull service.

name: ROOTS APARTMENT - PORTO DOWNTOWN - Free Parking
comments: This wonderful apartment is really in a A-plus location - so close to everything! Porto is the city that hates flatness - we got a great workout climbing hills and it was all worth it. The apartment was lovely and really easy to find and comfortable! The sun is magical almost throughout the whole day. Parking is a real bonus as Porto isn‚Äôt the easiest to get around in with a car. Park it and walk! Thank you Andr√©!

name: Duque de Terceira
comments: I‚Äôve already stayed in this place before and loved it. It was a pleasure to come back and enjoy Porto!

comments: Beautiful and spacious enough apartment for 4 persons. Good location; just across the river and close to metro General Torres. Cheap parking close by too. Excellent communication!

name: Apartamento Marques da Silva
comments: Lu√≠s's place is contemporary, cool, and in the best location in Porto. The apartment itself is spacious, with lots of interesting details. Lu√≠s was kind and accommodating, and check-in and check-out was straightforward. If I'm ever back in Porto I will stay here again. Highly recommended!

name: Studio - Casa do Pinheiro
comments: Pedro‚Äôs place was great! It was very easy to check-in and we got quick responses. The place was very spacious and clean, and also great location! Pedro also shared many helpful links of Porto, which really helped with our tour. It was a little loud at night on the weekend though.

Only tip for travelers, the loft stairs are steep, so if you get scared of climbing stairs to use the restroom at night, it may not be the perfect place for you. 5 stars either way.

name: Porto Smart Apartments - Downtown Poente
comments: Very clean and close to main historical sites. Super recommendations from the hosts.

Ein kleines und feines Zimmer mit extra Bad. Die Unterkunft ist sauber und hat alles was man f√ºr einen kurzen Aufenthalt braucht. Wir w√ºrden wiederkommen! F√ºr alle, die mit dem Auto anreisen- parkt etwas au√üerhalb und benutzt Uber - das ist genial und kostet fast nichts!

The host were kind enough to send me a 'where to eat list'. Check in was quick and easy, they come and welcome us right on time. Location was good, and I usually walk a lot.

name: Private roomfor2 - Cedofeita Duplex

name: "Casa do Sol" Apartment

name: Quinta Verde Esperan√ßa

name: SHARED ROOM: SOFA-BED + BALCONY + MAPS
comments: Adam‚Äôs a good guy and you‚Äôll feel at him at his place

name: Granny's House

We can take the metro in Jardin de Morrow in this region, just walk 10 au maximum minutes. House big, clean and comfortable. Ana me give always the advice from the day l reserve her house. And she prepare for us a big cake of Easter, the milk, bread even a bottle of vin local. Thanks a lot. I recommend it.

name: QUARTO TINTO

name: Large Studio with great views - Cl√©rigos
comments:
Perfect apartment in the perfect location!

Filipe‚Äôs apartment is in a perfect location. It is central to everything and we did not take public transport anywhere.
The apartment itself is beautiful with a fantastic view. It is spotlessly clean and had everything we needed.
Filipe is very thoughtful and makes sure you have all the information you need. We will definitely be staying here again when we are next in Porto!

The little apartment was beautiful, bright and the balcony a big plus! The bed is very comfortable, the location is great and communication was also super good!

name: Studio with Balcony / Porto Center
comments: Really good! Room is a little small but great for the price and was in a superb location

name: üå∑ Beaming Loft Apartment in the Heart of Porto

name: Loft Formosa duplo

name: Pinheiro Cardoso House - Room 4
comments:
N√£o recomendo! De todo!
Este Airbnb √© no ‚Äú‚Äù‚Äúcentro‚Äù‚Äù‚Äù do Porto. Encontra-de de facto a 10 minutos da esta√ß√£o Campo 24 de Agosto mas acaba por ser num s√≠tio que inspira pouca confian√ßa.
Ao chegarmos ao Airbnb, a chave do nosso quarto n√£o se encontrava na caixa de seguran√ßa, apenas a de outro, que acabamos por usar para entrar. Contact√°mos o anfitri√£o que nos informou para irmos ter √† recep√ß√£o para esta quest√£o ser resolvida com a pessoa de servi√ßo e que poder√≠amos sempre ligar caso tiv√©ssemos outro problema ou qualquer tipo de quest√£o. Esta senhora al√©m de inicialmente rude, fingiu que n√£o sabia do que est√°vamos a falar e depois l√° n√£o informou que o quarto ainda estava a ser limpo‚Ä¶.. depois da hora do check-in que constava na reserva.
Enquanto aguardamos na recep√ß√£o que o quarto estivesse pronto, a senhora de servi√ßo mencionou diversas vezes a uns senhores de, pelo que percebemos uma empresa de alarmes de seguran√ßa, os diversos assaltos que tinham acontecido na zona. Como tal, a primeira impress√£o que tivemos da zona confirmou-se.
Chegamos finalmente ao quarto e este n√£o corresponde sequer √†s fotografias. Optamos por ignorar este factor visto que n√£o t√≠nhamos outro s√≠tio onde ficar.
Ao tomar banho, o poliban estava de tal forma mal vedado que ficamos com a casa de banho e quarto encharcados. Al√©m disto, no final do banho a √°gua come√ßou a ficar fria.
No dia seguinte confirma-se que n√£o h√° √°gua quente. Liguei ao anfitri√£o para tentar tratar desta situa√ß√£o e o mesmo, depois de se ter logo √† partida disponibilizado, desligou a chamada e pediu que enviasse mensagem. Fi-lo e a mensagem nunca foi respondida. Liguei novamente e nunca fui atendida. Entretanto j√° ningu√©m se encontrava na recep√ß√£o e n√£o havia maneira de tratar desta quest√£o.

money and in a great location.

The apartment was perfect. It was beautifully presented and well-located. Eugenia and Luis have obviously taken a lot of care in the presentation of their property. The little details like the bottle of port in the room and breakfast provided each day make this a special place to stay. We're already talking about our return!

name: Mouzinho 134 - Historical Center - Yellow
comments:
Great, clean apartment that has everything you need for a great stay. The location is perfect for exploring Porto and it is just minutes away from the Ribera where the restaurants and port cavas are. The apartment is spacious and perfect for us (group of 4 friends). There is a dishwasher, laundry facilities, coffee maker, all which made us felt at home.

Engenia and Luis were very prompt in answering all queries prior to the trip. Checking in was a breeze for us, classy with a glass of port to start. The parking is minutes away from the apartment itself and we were delighted to leave the car and explore the town on foot. There are nice little souvenir shops just along the same street for last minute shopping and postcards. We loved the exquisite craft shops in the neighbourhood.

The family made sure that we had fresh bread delivered to our doorstep daily. There was amply supply of jam, butter, tea, coffee etc. But they were also very sweet in supplying their own annotated map that marked the awesome restaurants in the vicinity. Couldn't go wrong with any of their recommendations.

Would definitely stay with them again when we are back. Porto is a lovely place.
